column1: Local Foods////I have to write another review
column2: since my visits to local foods has decreased drastically. I am still a big fan of the concept
column3: and the staff is still amazing. Having said that
column4: I understand the menu is seasonal and does change. The caper tuna salad was the reason I kept coming back
column5: and it has been off the menu for probably 6 months or so. I am really unsure what is seasonal about tuna
column6: but so disappointed. On a brighter note
column7: the summer salad is really amazing!
